means: 使系统化，使成体系( systematize的过去式和过去分词 )

word_mean: 系统化的：使系统化或按照某一系统排列的

sentence.Network_en: All the main kind of science consists the systematized knowledge system.
sentence.Network_cn: 自然科学的各大门类构成一个系统化的知识体系.

sentence.Network_en: She has systematized her end of the business, too.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把她那一端的业务也制度化.

sentence.Network_en: American life is, of course, unevenly mechanized and systematized.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国的生活当然是机械化制度化的不平均.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Gradually the Government was systematized and lawlessness suppressed., 政府渐渐地变得系统化和非法地镇压.

entry.tran: 使系统化;使成体系;使条理化
entry.def: If you systematize things, you make them organized.

example.ex: You need to systematize your approach to problem solving.
example.tran: 你需要采用有条理的方法解决问题。
